argument.name: OutputString
argument.description: The coded limitation of the function.

argument.name: function
argument.description: The name of a function as returned by FUNCTIONS_GET().

page.description: Get the limitations for a named function.
page.discussion: The FUNCTION_LIMITATIONS_GET() function returns the limitations of the named function.
page.example: dim flist as C dim fdesc as C dim func as C dim i as N flist = functions_get("*", "F") fcount = line_count(flist) for i = 1 to fcount func = word(flist, i, crlf() ) fdesc = fdesc + func + chr(9) + function_limitations_get(func) + crlf() next i file.from_string("c:\functions.txt", fdesc)
